::: {#hero-heading} I am a data scientist at NHS South, Central and West CSU. I am interested in applying my knowledge of causal inference, statistics, probabilistic thinking, and machine learning to problems of understanding human behaviour. At heart, I want to understand how the world works, and I enjoy telling stories that help others do the same, leveraging data and my quantitative skill set in the process. ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} :::
